name: FLYVALNY 20!8
description:
FLYVALNY 20!8 - a stunning, humorous, adventure game with the track of the best music composer MORGENSHTERN!
Immerse yourself the world of adventure and help the protagonist to reach his dream and realize all his desires (if possible)

Features:
Сomposer's music MORGENSHTERN!
Juicy graphics
Beautiful world
The nice protagonist
+ Trading cards (after Valve approval)
